attributes.action: Landlords still charging rent shouldn’t get a freeze on their mortgage
attributes.additional_details: It is the right thing to do, one party cannot succeed while the other suffers during this outbreak
attributes.background: Landlords/home owners  have been given a freeze on their mortgages of three months, I do not think it is right that they should get this break and tenants should still be charged rent. Anyone who freezes their mortgage should also freeze their tenants rent.

rejection.details:
Decisions about providing a mortgage payment holiday are a matter for individual mortgage providers, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to cncourage lenders, landlords and utilities to freeze payments during lockdown, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
